title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A young girl growing up in the racially charged South learns valuable lessons about justice and empathy.

author: George Orwell
description: A chilling portrayal of a totalitarian society under constant surveillance and control.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A tragic story of love, wealth, and the American Dream set in the Roaring Twenties.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: Bilbo Baggins embarks on an unexpected adventure filled with dragons, treasure, and friendship.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: Elizabeth Bennet navigates love, reputation, and class in 19th-century England.
